class Solution:
    def countSubarrays(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        # Mine in a contest

        # curr, cnt, tot = 0, 0
        # for n in nums:
        #     if not (curr & k):
        #         curr = n
        #         cnt = 0
        #     else:
        #         curr &= n
        #         cnt += 1
        #     if curr == k:
        #         cnt += 
        # cnt = 0
        # n = len(nums)
        # for i in range(n):
        #     curr = nums[i]
        #     if curr == k:
        #         cnt += 1
        #     for j in range(i + 1, n):
        #         curr &= nums[j]
        #         if curr == k:
        #             cnt += 1
        #         elif curr < k:
        #             break
        # return cnt
        cnts = {}
        tot = 0
        for n in nums:
            # print("Processing", n)
            if not (n & k) and k:
                # tot += cnts.get(k, 0)
                cnts = {}
                continue
            new_cnts = {}
            for cnt, cnt_val in list(cnts.items()):
                new_cnts[cnt & n] = new_cnts.get(cnt & n, 0) + cnt_val
                # print("partner", cnt, cnt_val, cnt & n, new_cnts)
            new_cnts[n] = new_cnts.get(n, 0) + 1
            cnts = new_cnts
            tot += new_cnts.get(k, 0)
            # print(cnts)
        return tot
